name: Shimmer & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:
ingredients: Water, Mica (Ci 77019), Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Silica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Squalane, Polysorbate 60, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Triethanolamine, Tin Oxide, Carbomer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Hexylene Glycol. (+/-) Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Carmine (Ci 75470).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to lid and blend using your fingers or a brush. .-Wear alone or over eyeshadow... Precautions:.-In case of eye irritation, discontinue use of all eye cosmetics and consult your ophthalmologist at once.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on cakey (even with a little) and immediately flakes off. Huge disappointment. I've only worn it on Halloween for zombie makeup but would never wear it otherwise. Going in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stilaâ€™s liquid eyeshadow is an absolute staple in my everyday routine. The gold is beautiful. You can leave it as is or build color over it. I love it! I have the gold and rose.
